imdb.title: Madlax
imdb.plot: A beautiful, female blonde assassin with supreme gun fighting skills, accepts contracts to kill villains, and fight against an oppressive army.

episodes.title: Gun Dance 'Dance'
episodes.plot: The story opens up with Madlax, a very deadly and sexy female gun-for-hire parachuting from a helicopter deep into a Latin American jungle, where she is to recover a floppy disk from a unskilled teenage rebel fighter name Peter Anyan. Later when the enemy army closes in on Peter, Madlax puts on a long flowing evening gown, and using her supreme, almost supernatural agility, and shooting skills, ambushes the army to try and save him.

episodes.title: Blue Moon 'Moon'
episodes.plot: Madlax is to assassinate the Chief of the Gazth-Sonikan Army so she sneaks into his hotel room and finds out he is ordering his own death as they talk and embrace each on the night before she is to kill him.

episodes.title: Picture Book 'Nature'
episodes.plot: Margaret decides she wants to have a complete copy of a picture book.

episodes.title: Soul Word 'Soul'
episodes.plot: Eric and Madlax hear a rumor that someone in a G-S village can read Elies

episodes.title: Remaining Scent 'Scent'
episodes.plot: Margaret and friends go to stay at a hotel that Carrossea is also staying at.

episodes.title: Foreign Country 'Object'
episodes.plot: Vanessa realizes someone may be targeting her and hires Madlax as a bodyguard.

episodes.title: Lost Will 'Close'
episodes.plot: Margaret is insane and homocidal now.

episodes.title: Awakening Sound 'Awake'
episodes.plot: In Nafrece, Margaret meets Carrossea Doon, who may know something about her Book. In Gazth-Sonika, Vanessa is desperate to find the encryption key to unlock the data, but a sudden call from SSS disrupts her plans

episodes.title: Forgotten Memory 'Memory'
episodes.plot: Carrossea finds out about Madlax's Elta Taluta incident and assumes she's dead.

episodes.title: False Dispute 'Camouflage'
episodes.plot: Limelda figures out that Vanessa is working with Madlax.

episodes.title: Gun Rhyme 'Moment'
episodes.plot: Madlax and Vanessa are framed for the murder of the king's cousin.

episodes.title: Double Separation 'Duo'
episodes.plot: All pieces are in motion: Limelda desperately tries to cope with the truth about her whole life, Madlax searches for the truth behind her past, Margaret is ready to deal with Enfant if they help her to find Vanessa, and Vanessa herself hurriedly learns to shoot.

episodes.title: Target Book 'Holy'
episodes.plot: Fighting their way through all cordons and front lines, Madlax and Margaret strive to meet the only person who can share with them the knowledge about Margaret's Holy Book and their own destinies. Meanwhile, Carrossea makes an unexpected move, too.

episodes.title: True Fight 'Wish'
episodes.plot: Margaret is invited to a party and a boy hits on her.

episodes.title: Cruel Confession 'Guilty'
episodes.plot: Carrossea goes through the door and finds out that he is actually dead and has been this entire time.

episodes.title: Violent Feelings 'Rage'
episodes.plot: Madlax and the group set off for the woods and get separated.

episodes.title: Lost Hearts 'Doubt'
episodes.plot: Margaret is insane and homocidal now. She is also convinced Friday is her Father.

episodes.title: Devoted Heart 'Hearts'
episodes.plot: Madlax shoots a lot of people and convinces her that she is invulnerable now. She has devleoped magical powers where she can tell helicopters to come her and they will obey her.

episodes.title: Holy Blood 'Saint'
episodes.plot: Margaret kills her father and she, Madlax and Laetitia split into three.

episodes.title: Broken Pieces 'Pupil'
episodes.plot: Margaret makes the decision to separate Laetitia, Madlax and herself.
